ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: So... is anyone keeping up with who drops what?  If so, could you send it to me? -=B=- A sucker for spoilers ... From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
ygData.messageBody:
So... is anyone keeping up with who drops what? If so, could you send it to
me?

-=B=-
A sucker for spoilers



-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <garramone@...>
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com' <eqbards@egroups.com>
Date: Thursday, May 18, 2000 11:31 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions


>bah hehe, yes and rogue legs too (they have 50 mana LOL). VS seems to be
>the leg guy. i heard the cazic-thule server killed him as well yesterday,
>so if word spreads how to kill him he'll probably be buffed soon. but not
>before we get another legs after today's patch =) the 56 bard in my guild
>got those legs, he's also the guild leader and plays a bit more than me and
>has tons of points to use on loot. i had won the RBB at Vox right before
we
>did VS. i knew for a fact if i used my points on the RBB that those legs
>would drop.
>
>Shada
>
>> I'm betting Venril Sathir. I think Shada's guild is the only
>> one to kill
>> him so far, and coincidentally the only ones to find warrior and bard
>> greaves. :)
>>
>>
>> Elwyn <Da`Kor>
>> 53 Minstrel of Erollisi Marr
